suppress.notes: This has nothing to do with this artifact, it detects nexus in the pom file and thinks that it has something to do with a nexus vulnerability
Does not apply as tomcat is not installed as a service
Does not apply as tomcat is not installed as a service
only effects distribution based tomcat that has been backported. our tomcat version has the fix in it
only effects distribution based tomcat that has been backported. our tomcat version has the fix in it
Does not apply as we're not using the XmlMapper.
Applies to Mac OS X implementation of Java only.
This vulnerability is related to a Ruby Gem, not Spring Boot Mail.
